Class CollegeChecking

java.lang.Object
com.example.project3.banking.Account
com.example.project3.banking.Checking
com.example.project3.banking.CollegeChecking
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Account>
public class CollegeChecking extends Checking
CollegeChecking is a specialized type of Checking account tailored for college students. It includes an associated campus to specify the university location and overrides certain behaviors of the Checking account, such as having no monthly fees. This class extends the Checking class.

  • Constructor Details

    • CollegeChecking

      public CollegeChecking(Branch branch, AccountType type, Profile holder, Campus campus, double balance)
      Constructs a CollegeChecking account with the specified branch, account type, account holder's profile, associated campus, and initial balance. This constructor initializes the campus specific to the CollegeChecking account.
      Parameters:
      branch - the branch where the account is created
      type - the type of the account, represented as an AccountType enum
      holder - the profile of the account holder
      campus - the campus associated with the account, represented as a Campus enum
      balance - the initial balance of the account

  • Method Details

    • fee

      public double fee()
      Overrides the fee method to calculate the account's monthly fee. For the CollegeChecking account, no fee is applied.
      Overrides:
      fee in class Checking
      Returns:
      the monthly fee for the CollegeChecking account, which is always 0.0

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Converts the CollegeChecking instance to a string representation. The returned string includes the details provided by the superclass's toString method along with the associated campus information.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Account
      Returns:
      a string representation of the CollegeChecking instance, including account details and campus information
